img_summary: The image depicts a tray containing several seeds, likely associated with the game "Black Myth: Wukong." Positioned between descriptions of various seeds, the image likely represents a specific type of seed used in the game, possibly the "Golden Lotus Seeds" or another uncommon seed obtained through gameplay actions such as defeating enemies or collecting items. The seeds are part of the game's narrative, contributing to the player's progression by offering unique abilities or enhancements.
